tool_description: Get latest climate change news with API
name: Get Climate Change News
title: Get Climate Change News

api_list.name: Get Climate Change News with ID
api_list.description: Get climate change news with ID

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change news
api_list.description: It will provide all climate change news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
